q_ch: 产品类型是Dress的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks for Dress's product type?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the sewing tasks for dresses. Here's a neat table summarizing the tasks:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group   | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status   |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|----------------|------------------|----------|
| 12      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-12       | Master Sewers   | 150            | 150              | Complete 😄 |
| 13      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-06       | Master Sewers   | 130            | 130              | Complete 😄 |
| 14      | 2024-03-18       | 2024-04-08       | Master Sewers   | 120            | 120              | Complete 😄 |
| 11      | 2024-03-21       | 2024-04-14       | Premier Sewers  | 140            | 140              | In Progress 🔄 |

Looks like the Master Sewers have been busy bees, completing all their tasks! The Premier Sewers are still working on theirs. Keep up the great work, team! 🧵✨

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products with the type description "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.number AS planned_number, st.completed_number, st.status FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE op.product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks for the products identified in Step 1

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the sewing tasks for dresses. Here’s what I found for you:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group   | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status     |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|----------------|------------------|------------|
| 12      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-12       | Master Sewers   | 150            | 120              | Completed  |
| 13      | 2024-03-27       | 2024-04-06       | Master Sewers   | 130            | 120              | Completed  |
| 14      | 2024-03-18       | 2024-04-08       | Master Sewers   | 120            | 120              | Completed  |
| 11      | 2024-03-21       | 2024-04-14       | Premier Sewers  | 140            | 100              | In Progress|

Looks like the Master Sewers have been busy bees 🐝, completing most of their tasks! The Premier Sewers are still working on theirs. Keep up the great work, team! 😄
